members.name: Gaisano Building (Clamped to Terrain)
members.description: Gaisano building automatically clamped to terrain height. Works correctly in both 3D smooth and 3D terrain modes.

info.name: Terrain Clamping
info.content: This tileset uses automatic terrain clamping to ensure it appears on the terrain surface regardless of the terrain mode.

info.name: Height Offset
info.content: The height offset can be adjusted in the customProperties if the building appears too high or too low.

members.name: Gaisano Building (Slightly Above Ground)
members.description: Gaisano building clamped to terrain with a 2-meter offset above ground.

members.name: Gaisano Building (Original - No Clamping)
members.description: Original gaisano tileset without terrain clamping. May appear under terrain in 3D terrain mode.

info.name: Note
info.content: This version does not use terrain clamping and may appear under the terrain when 3D terrain mode is enabled.
